snippet: Plans for two tribal casinos are drawing fierce opposition from nearby tribes with casinos that they say will be hurt by the newcomers.
abstract: Plans for two off-reservation Indian casinos in California are drawing fierce opposition from nearby tribes with casinos that they say will be hurt by the newcomers; intense campaign against Enterprise Rancheria of Maidu Indians near Oroville and the other applicant, the North Fork Rancheria of Mono Indians, comes as the gambling market has grown crowded; opposing tribes accuse the newcomers of encroaching on areas to which they have no historical ties.
lead_paragraph: Plans for two tribal casinos are drawing fierce opposition from nearby tribes with casinos that they say will be hurt by the newcomers.

headline.seo: Lucrative California Gambling Pits Indian Tribe Against Tribe
headline.main: Lucrative Gambling Pits Tribe Against Tribe
headline.print_headline: Lucrative Gambling Pits Tribe Against Tribe
